system.description:
You are committed to a specific sense of principles and driven by righteous fury. Woe to the one who attracts your ire. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Strength or Charisma score increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.

  • While you are raging, increase the damage dice of your Divine Smite by one step, for example from d8s to d10s.

  • Your herald levels count as berserker levels for the purpose of the Extra Attack feature.

  • You learn the following Furious Critical option, which does not count against your Furious Critical options known:

    Righteous Fury

    You regain a spent use of Divine Smite. In order to use this feature, you must have scored a critical hit against a creature with a CR equal to at least half your character level. Once you have used this a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, it does not function again until you finish a long rest.
system.prerequisite: 3 levels in berserker, 3 levels in herald
